name: Apothecary
description: A character who is trained in the art of creating and administering medicinal remedies, poisons, and potions.

name: Artisan
description: A character who crafts functional and beautiful items using techniques passed down through generations, creating pieces that honor both practical needs and artistic expression.

name: Artist
description: A character who is skilled in creating and appreciating works of art, music, or performance.

name: Bandit
description: A character who has made a living through robbery and theft, often working alone or as part of a group.

name: Barbarian
description: A character who hails from tribal or nomadic societies outside of civilization's reach, relying on primal instinct and raw strength rather than formal training.

name: Bard
description: A character who uses music and performance to tell stories and entertain, even channeling spiritual energy through song and dance.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: A character who makes a living by tracking down and capturing wanted individuals and turning them over to the authorities for a reward.

name: Cartographer
description: A character who creates maps and is knowledgeable about geography.

name: Criminal
description: A character who has a background in illegal activities and survives through deception and stealth.

name: Cult Initiate
description: A character who belongs to a secretive order that performs forbidden rituals to channel arcane energies, often operating in remote locations or underground sanctuaries.

name: Druid
description: A character who has a deep connection to nature and is capable of harnessing its power.

name: Embalmer
description: A character who is trained in the arts of preparing bodies for the afterlife through specialized preservation techniques.

name: Entertainer
description: A character who makes a living through performance, often as a musician, actor, or acrobat.

name: Farmhand
description: A character who has worked on a farm, and has experience with manual labor, animal husbandry, and crop cultivation.

name: Gladiator
description: A character who has trained and fought in the arena for entertainment and sport. They may have been forced into this life or chose it as a means of survival or fame.

name: Guard
description: A character who has worked as a security guard or in a similar role, protecting people, places, or things.

name: Guardian
description: A character trained to protect sacred or valuable sites from trespassers, with knowledge of defensive tactics and sometimes ancient traditions.

name: Healer
description: A character who has knowledge of medicine and the ability to cure ailments.

name: Hunter
description: A character who makes a living through hunting and tracking game.

name: Innkeeper
description: A character who runs a place of lodging, serving food and drink to travelers and guests.

name: Investigator
description: A character who uses logic and deduction to solve problems.

name: Magus
description: A character who possesses arcane powers strictly supervised by a religious order dedicated to the detection and eradication of arcane cults and other supernatural threats.

name: Mercenary
description: A character who hires themselves out as a soldier for hire and will work for whoever pays the most.

name: Merchant
description: A character who travels between settlements transporting and exchanging goods, navigating both physical routes and social customs.

name: Monk
description: A character who follows a monastic lifestyle and is skilled in combat and spiritual practices.

name: Officer
description: A character who has served in a military or law enforcement organization and has experience giving orders and managing troops. They may have risen through the ranks or been commissioned as a leader.

name: Pact-Bound
description: A character who has entered into a forbidden agreement with an otherworldly entity, gaining arcane knowledge and power in exchange for service or sacrifice, often at great personal cost.

name: Philosopher
description: A character who studies the nature of existence and reality.

name: Pirate
description: A character who makes a living through robbery and plunder on the high seas.

name: Politician
description: A character who is skilled in navigating the complex world of political intrigue and manipulation.

name: Priest
description: A character who is devoted to a religious faith and has knowledge of its beliefs and practices.

name: Ranger
description: A character who is skilled in survival and tracking in the wilderness.

name: Renegade Mage
description: A character who combines martial training with forbidden arcane knowledge, often a deserter from state-controlled magic orders or a self-taught practitioner on the run.

name: Sacred Warrior
description: A character who has pledged their blade and life to a deity, serving as the martial arm of their faith and drawing strength from divine favor in battle.

name: Sailor
description: A character who has experience with seafaring, navigation, and life at sea, including knowledge of ships and the ability to handle them.

name: Scholar
description: A character who has dedicated their life to the pursuit of knowledge and academic study.

name: Scribe
description: A character who is skilled in writing and copying texts.

name: Seer
description: A character who possesses supernatural abilities to see and perceive things beyond the realm of ordinary perception.

name: Servant
description: A character who has worked as a servant or in a similar role, serving a master or mistress.

name: Shaman
description: A character who is a spiritual leader communicating with the spirit world and the ancestors to provide guidance and healing to their community.

name: Soldier
description: A character who is trained in combat and serves in a military organization.

name: Sorcerer
description: A character who has a natural talent for magic and has honed their abilities through years of study and practice.

name: Spy
description: A character who gathers information through stealth and deceit.

name: Tavern Fighter
description: A character who has made a living through brawling and fighting in taverns or other similar establishments.

name: Thug
description: A character who has a history of using violence and intimidation to achieve their goals. They may have been part of a criminal organization or worked as hired muscle.

name: Wilderness Guide
description: A character who leads travelers through dangerous terrains, whether desert wastes, dense jungles, or treacherous mountains, knowing where to find resources and avoid hazards.

name: Witch
description: A character who has knowledge of magic and the supernatural and has honed their abilities through personal experience, intuition, and natural talent. They may have learned their abilities through a family tradition, communing with spirits and nature, or through experimentation and self-discovery.
